Package uk.co.dancowan.robots.srv.hal.camera

Interface Summary
CameraImageConsumer<T> Provides methods to allow an ImageDecoder instance to push images for rendering.
CameraListener  
ColourBinListener Implementations will be notified of changes to the ColourBin's colour.
 

Class Summary
Blob Represents an area of pixels matching a given colour bin's content.
Camera Domain object to manage SRV camera data.
CameraPollThread Poll worker thread adds GetImage commands to the SRV with a configurable delay.
ColourBin Represents and SRV internal colour bin.
FrameDecoder Takes pixel information from the serial InputStream and creates an java.awt.Image for rendering.
YUV Simple container for a colour's Y, U and V values in the YUV colour space.
